overview: Good Samaritan Brad Knight helps with the chores when his attractive neighbor Melissa Moore pretends she has an injury. Devoted wife August Ames seeks revenge with her cheating husband's golf partner, plastic surgeon Jessy Jones. Lead guitarist Xander Corvus lets his band's biggest fan Valentina Nappi audition to be their roadie. Lily Adams brings her new classmate Zoe Parker home to meet her father Marcus London.
title: What Happened Last Night
